about_the_game:
Thank you for supporting AfterM.A.T.H.! This Sponsor Pack DLC is a pure support option, allowing players who love our game to show their support for our development work.

This DLC does not include any additional game content or perks; it is simply a way to help us continue developing and improving the game. We deeply appreciate every player who chooses to sponsor us, as your support will enable us to create more high-quality content and updates.

If you enjoy our game and want to see it continue to grow, please consider purchasing this Sponsor Pack. Thank you once again for your support and understanding!

name: AfterM.A.T.H. - Sponsor Pack
short_description: Support the development of AfterM.A.T.H. by purchasing this Sponsor Pack. This DLC does not include any additional content; it is a way to show your support for our ongoing work.
